column4: Hey ubuntu guys, I would just like to say that the more I use ubuntu and become familiar with it, the more I like it
so much more sexy than windows
roadkill is more sexy than windows.
Is there any way to get more color themes for GNOME? the ubuntu type themes
there are a lot of themes on art.gnome.org [i think that's it]  - im sure there are some simple colour variations there
